summary:
Telstra Corporation Essential Change Notification - CMART 3513026. Telstra Corporation will implement maintenance work in Australia due to planned hardware replacement work.
Your service(s) may experience a break to service during the change window.
***At this current time, your link will be down during this maintenance and current cable fault AAG Segment 1i (Hongkong -BU4). Please contact our service desk [gsd@team.telstra.com] if necessary***
